chlorine.name: Chlorine
safety_precautions: Do not mix with other chemicals
chlorine.storage_guidelines: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and other chemicals.
chlorine.emergency_procedures: In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water and seek medical advice.

muriatic_acid.name: Muriatic Acid
safety_precautions: Wear chemical-resistant gloves and eye protection
Always add acid to water, never water to acid
Do not mix with chlorine or other chemicals
muriatic_acid.storage_guidelines: Store in original container in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and other chemicals.
muriatic_acid.emergency_procedures: In case of contact with skin or eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water for at least 15 minutes and seek medical advice.

sodium_bicarbonate.name: Sodium Bicarbonate
sodium_bicarbonate.storage_guidelines: Store in a cool, dry place.
sodium_bicarbonate.emergency_procedures: In case of contact with eyes, rinse with water.

calcium_chloride.name: Calcium Chloride
safety_precautions: Avoid contact with skin and eyes
calcium_chloride.storage_guidelines: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
calcium_chloride.emergency_procedures: In case of contact with skin or eyes, rinse with plenty of water.

cyanuric_acid.name: Cyanuric Acid
cyanuric_acid.storage_guidelines: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
cyanuric_acid.emergency_procedures: In case of contact with skin or eyes, rinse with plenty of water.
